messages.content: Build a modern landing page for a coffee shop called 'Brew & Byte'. It should have a dark aesthetic, a hero section with a catchy slogan, and a menu grid

Got it! A dark-themed landing page for Brew & Byte with a hero section and a menu grid. To make sure we nail the vibe, could you tell me: 1) Do you have a specific slogan in mind, or should we propose a few options? 2) For the menu grid, will you provide the menu items and prices, or should we use placeholder content for the MVP?
use any slogan you like, and for the MVP use teh general placeholder prices and items.

Perfect! We'll craft a sleek, dark-themed landing page for Brew & Byte. I'll propose a catchy slogan for the hero section and fill the menu grid with placeholder items and prices so you can see the full layout right away.
The MVP landing page for Brew & Byte is ready and deployed at: https://brew-byte.netlify.app/ — feel free to review it and let me know if you’d like any tweaks!

requirements: Dark-themed landing page for Brew & Byte with hero section (custom slogan) and menu grid populated with placeholder items/prices.
plan_content:
# Brew & Byte Landing Page
## Visual Identity
The Brew & Byte landing page will feature a dark-themed design, incorporating the principles of minimalism and glassmorphism. The color scheme will be based on shades of slate, with an emphasis on whitespace to create a clean and modern aesthetic.

* **Color Scheme:**
	+ Background: `bg-slate-950`
	+ Text: `text-slate-50`
	+ Accent: `bg-white/5` for cards and `border-white/10` for borders
* **Typography:**
	+ Font Family: 'Inter' (Google Fonts)
	+ Font Size: Various sizes using Tailwind CSS's font size classes
* **Components:**
	+ Cards: `bg-white/5 border border-white/10 rounded-2xl`
	+ Buttons: `rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-medium transition`

## Files to Create
The following files will be created to bring the Brew & Byte landing page to life:

* `index.html`: The main HTML file for the landing page
* `style.css` (not required, as we're using Tailwind CSS via CDN)
* `script.js` (optional, for any additional JavaScript functionality)

The page will be structured into the following sections:

1. **Hero Section:**
	* Custom slogan: "Fuel your code with every brew"
	* Call-to-action (CTA) button: "Explore Menu"
2. **Menu Grid:**
	* 6-8 placeholder menu items with prices
	* Each item will feature a card component with a brief description and price

By following the design rules and using the specified tech stack, we'll create a visually stunning and user-friendly landing page for Brew & Byte.
